name: Erdős–Straus conjecture
rephrased: For every integer n greater than or equal to 2, the fraction 4/n can be written as the sum of three unit fractions.
implication_form: If n is an integer greater than or equal to 2, then there exist positive integers x, y, and z such that 4/n = 1/x + 1/y + 1/z.
posed_by: Paul Erdős and Ronald M. Straus
